overview: Nadia is a beautiful and arrogant girl, and her arrogance pushes her to reject everyone who proposes to her, including her cousin Sayed and her cousin Wael, and after a period of time Nadia faces a shocking fact, which is that all of those whom she refused to marry have married other women better and more beautiful than her, and even Wael himself has married a rich girl, which makes her feel remorseful.
title: Memories and Regret
